seo.title: Co spakować na Wybrzeże Amalfitańskie
seo.description: Sezonowa lista rzeczy do Positano i na wybrzeże: obuwie, warstwy, ochrona przeciwsłoneczna i dodatki.

sections.title: Footwear
body: Grippy shoes for stairs and hikes; sandals with tread for beaches.
Avoid slick soles — lanes can be steep and polished.

sections.title: Layers & sun
body: A light rain jacket in shoulder months.

sections.title: Bags & luggage
body: Backpacks beat big suitcases for stairs; keep valuables close.
Bring a refillable bottle; markets sell large bottles for refills.

tips: Skip heavy hard-shell suitcases if your stay involves long stair climbs.

a: Yes, but peak-season prices jump—pack essentials to avoid markups.

faqs.q: Do I need to bring a bathrobe?
